Secure One-Way Data Transfer

Hardware-enforced protection

Unparalleled Security Features

Terafence‘s revolutionary data diode technology combines uncompromising security with exceptional performance to safeguard critical infrastructure.

Hardware-Enforced Security

Physical one-way data transfer that ensures absolute protection against malware, ransomware, and external cyber threats.

Non-Routable Protocol

Proprietary data transmission protocol that eliminates IP-based attack vectors and prevents network exposure.

Zero Latency

High-performance data transfer with minimal latency, supporting real-time operations without compromising security.

Minimal Attack Surface

Purpose-built hardware with optimized firmware that dramatically reduces potential vulnerabilities.

Seamless Integration

Compatible with existing OT/IT systems, supporting multiple industrial protocols and legacy infrastructure.

Regulatory Compliance

Meets NERC CIP, IEC 62443, NIST 800-82, and other critical infrastructure protection standards and regulations.

Technical Specifications

Advanced technology designed for maximum security and performance in critical infrastructure environments.

Physical Specifications

  • Form Factor1U Rack-mountable chassis
  • Dimensions438mm × 44mm × 292mm
  • Weight4.5kg (9.9lbs)
  • Operating Temperature0°C to 40°C (32°F to 104°F)
  • Redundant PowerDual hot-swappable power supplies

Processing Capabilities

  • ThroughputUp to 10 Gbps
  • LatencySub-millisecond processing time
  • FPGADedicated hardware processing units
  • Memory16GB ECC RAM
  • Storage256GB SSD for logging and configuration

Industry Use Cases

Terafence‘s data diode technology provides critical protection across various industries with unique security challenges and regulatory requirements.

Energy & Utilities

Secure SCADA systems and operational networks in power generation, transmission, and distribution facilities while allowing safe data flow to business intelligence systems.

Key Applications:

  • •Power grid monitoring
  • •Smart meter data collection
  • •Remote substation management

Manufacturing

Protect industrial control systems while enabling production data analytics and remote monitoring capabilities with zero risk of cyber intrusion.

Key Applications:

  • •Production line monitoring
  • •Quality control systems
  • •Supply chain integration

Oil & Gas

Maintain security of upstream, midstream, and downstream operations while enabling operational data visibility across distributed infrastructure.

Key Applications:

  • •Pipeline monitoring
  • •Wellhead automation
  • •Refinery control systems

Defense & Government

Ensure classified networks remain isolated while allowing controlled information sharing between different security domains and clearance levels.

Key Applications:

  • •Cross-domain solutions
  • •Intelligence data transfer
  • •Secure command & control

Healthcare & Research

Protect sensitive medical systems and research networks while enabling secure data sharing with external partners and regulatory bodies.

Key Applications:

  • •Medical device security
  • •Research data protection
  • •Regulatory compliance

Financial Services

Safeguard critical financial infrastructure from cyber threats while maintaining reliable data flow for transaction processing and regulatory reporting.

Key Applications:

  • •Trading systems protection
  • •Payment processing security
  • •Core banking infrastructure
